structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS AS TO OFFICES AND OFFICERS -- SOCIAL SECURITY FOR PUBLIC EMPLOYEES -- EMPLOYEES RETIREMENT SYSTEM

law.catch_line: Discharge of duties, when officer to enter upon.
law.text: All officers other than those mentioned in KRS 61.020 may enter upon the discharge of the duties of their offices at the time prescribed by the Constitution or the statute creating the office, upon taking the oath and executing the bond required by law.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3759.
